version_description:
Toolbar customization enhancements: edit of custom keys (with long press) and
special string as enter command.
Fix ls column alignment and update to iOS 13.

Add charset connection settings.
New duplicate session feature.
UI bug fix.

New haptic and sound feedback.
Improved support for East Asian Characters.
New touch/face id security option.

・Support for Pinyin keyboard
・Support for more terminal types
・Additional charset encodings
・Fix for external keyboard support
・Updated and improved external keyboard support
・Fix refresh of connection list on Files

・Improvements on Files extension
・New search filter over connection list

・New redesigned section for authentication keys
・New key generation (RSA, ECDSA, Ed25519)
・New support for key authentication with Secure Enclave
・Support for light/dark appearance
・Bug fixes

・New connection through SSH proxy
・New connection history
・New SCP transfer protocol option
・Usage improvements for the external keyboard

・New Shortcuts support
・New Command snippet section
・Support for additional fonts
・Fix keyboard rotation on iPad mini
・Bug fix and general improvements

・New groups for connections
・New blinking cursor option

・New Tag labeling for connections
・New cursor type
・New font size configuration for tab
・New SourceCodePro fonts
・Improved color selection
・New import of color schema file
・Improved text file editor with choice of syntax type

・New SSH compression option
・Bug fixes
